description:
One Day Love
Fumi is putting a lot of effort into handmade cookies. She says that they`re a Christmas present for an older classmate hat she admires: Takahiro. She even wrapped them up with cute wrapping paper and gives it to him, but...
Sumo Santa
Mom and her friends as well as their children have gathered at the Kamohara house for a Christmas party. While the moms are boasting about the chicken dishes they made at home from leftovers, Dad, who feels like he doesn`t have a place to go, keeps on walking...
Grandma`s Taste
Fumi and Mom argued and both of them shut themselves in their rooms. But when Grandma cooks nostalgic caramel cookie in the kitchen, Mom gets lured by the sweet smell...
Letting Children Go
Lately, there are times when Mom feels lonely. Times when the children go straight back to their room right after dinner, times when Mom feels that Bunji`s shoes are unusually large...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: One Day Love / Sumo Santa / Grandma`s Taste / Letting Children Go
一日の恋 / おすもうサンタ / おばあちゃんの味 / 子離れ
